channel.title: Relentless (508,525,Real Con,Farm,Agility)
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/119nnrb.png[/img]
[URL=http://relentlessps.com/]Relentless Forum[/URL]
[U][B]Thread Under Construction![/B] [/U]Media and information about the current features will be added periodically when I have the time to do so. I'm pretty busy irl at the moment so I will most likely prioritize actually coding the server over making new media for coding which already exists
Relentless is a 508 loading 525 type server.
[SIZE=4][B]Automatic Starter[/B][/SIZE]
[SPOILER=AUTOMATIC STARTER]Starter is automatically added to your account.
The "X" button is hidden from the bank interface. When you right click an item on the bank interface all you get in "Cancel" option. You can't walk away, if you try to it does nothing. Each time you're given a set of items you receive information about them. If you close your client and log back in it will resume the auto-starter without any glitching.
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9CqDRyGrsg]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9CqDRyGrsg[/url][/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4][B][color=red]Skills[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR="#FFD700"]All skills except Hunter are coded, but as it says at the top the thread is 'under construction'.[/COLOR]
[SPOILER=EXPERIENCE LAMPS]For yellow genie lamps you are granted "Skill Level x 100" instead of x10
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/mmzhqe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/oaacrq.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=AGILITY][B][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EwQ7-LYimtQ]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EwQ7-LYimtQ[/url][/B][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=FARMING]NOTE: Right before making the video I increased plant speed by x50 or x2000 for trees. The real timers are just like on RuneScape.
System Features:
Rake the weeds out from patch (exp is given) Seed dibber required to plant seeds (exp is given for planting) Correct seed amount requirements(3 for allotment, 1 for herb and flower, ect) 34 Fully Functional Patches (5 Herb, 8 Allotment, 5 Flower, 5 Fruit Tree, 3 Spirit Tree, 4 Tree Patches, 4 Bush Patches) All patches support all seed/plant types (Herb patch even support Gout Tubers which grow Goutweeds) Timer is not handled through tick (plants will continue to grow if user logs out) Amount of produce to harvest saves (can't get unlimited by relogging) Compost bins are coded, but since death/disease is not the only use is to increase the yield of produce. Fruit trees need health checked, then produce harvested, chopped down, and stump dug out
[URL=http://"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gssDFH38bcM"]Relentless - Farming [Updated/Overview][/URL]
Supports the Limpwurt only Flower Patch at the Western Wilderness Ruins
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/5zma37.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=CONSTRUCTION][COLOR="#FFD700"]The Construction skill is unfinished (as of 8/15/2014)[/COLOR]
There is more media pertaining to the Construction skill on my [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/show-off/545644-508-real-construction-base.html"]Construction Show-off Thread[/URL] such as things I've updated since I first made the video.
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7bm-9cc_aQ]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7bm-9cc_aQ[/url]
[COLOR="#FFD700"]New video(8/15/2014):[/COLOR]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XBkleqIQX0Q]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XBkleqIQX0Q[/url][/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4][B][color=red]Mini-Games[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[SPOILER="BARROWS"][B]Barrows[/B]
This is a simple version of Barrows. Just kill all 6 brothers and the last you kill will drop your reward.
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/2cr99jm.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="DUEL ARENA"][B]Duel Arena[/B]
[B][COLOR="#FFD700"]Note: These are old pictures, people said they didn't like the green text overlay so I took it out already.[/COLOR][/B]
Instead of doing high risk stake fights and giveback fights in the wilderness or Bounty Hunter you also have the option to use the Duel Arena. The Duel Arena can be easily accessed via Duelling Ring(the Wise Old Man will also give you a free teleport).
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/358pf9u.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2rgomes.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2gxp5iq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1427ktw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/6rres4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/20zee7r.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=PARTY ROOM - BALLOON BONANZA]Balloon Bonanza Feature: You can fill the chest up with items then pull the lever and pay 50k for you stuff to be dropped. After a certain amount of time has passed balloons will drop. Popping these balloons can give you an item which was put into the chest. NPCs around the server will announce the drop party.
Knightly Dance Feature: You can pay 5k for knights to spawn and sing you a song. They can sing you the following songs... "It's Not Unusual" by Tom Jones (This is a reference to the Fresh Prince of Bel Air) "Never Gonna Give You Up" by Rick Astley (The "Rick Roll" Song)
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oEhqenRnivY]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oEhqenRnivY[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bk9S2KtVDP0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bk9S2KtVDP0[/url][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=CLUE SCROLLS]System has at least 1 of every type of clue available.
25 Different Scrolls Available (currently)
2 Anagram Clues 4 Uri Emote Clues 5 Map Clues 3 Riddle Clues 2 Simple Clues 9 Coordinate Clues
Different Scrolls available for Different Difficulties (same as RS)
Easy: Simple, Map, Riddle, Uri Emote Medium: Simple, Anagram, Map, Riddle, Uri Emote, Coordinate Hard & Elite: Anagram, Map, Riddle, Uri Emote, Coordinate
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=33Yx9jpu9R8]Relentless - Clue Scroll/Treasure Trail [Updated] - YouTube[/url][/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4][B][color=red]Miscellaneous[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[SPOILER=FAIRY RINGS]Realistic system (Main fairy ring in Zanaris lets you access all others, all others teleport you to main ring in Zanaris) All fairy ring codes except two (no mapdata for Enchanted Valley or Gorak Area... someone give plawks) You actually walk into the ring You can use Lunar or Dramen staff Supports multi code combinations (like when you use AIR, DLR, DJQ, AJS to get to the secret fairy place in real RuneScape's fairy tale part 2 quest) Entering wrong code will teleport you a short distance from the fairy ring.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vO9-eXapPls]Relentless - Fairy RIngs - YouTube[/url]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/jfw41l.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=FOOD]I think even the small things have a certain level of importance.
Here is a list of all the food items which can be eaten:
Plain Pizza (heals 7 per slice) Meat Pizza (heals 8 per slice) Anchovy Pizza (heals 9 per slice) Pineapple Pizza (heals 11 per slice)
Apple Pie (heals 7 per slice) Redberry Pie (heals 5 per slice) Meat Pie (heals 6 per slice) Garden Pie (heals 6 per slice, +3 Farming) Fish Pie (heals 6 per slice, +3 Fishing Boost) Admiral Pie (heals 8 per slice, +5 Fishing Boost) Wild Pie (heals 11 per slice, +5 Slayer Boost, +4 Ranged Boost) Summer Pie (heals 11 per slice, +5 Agility Boost)
Ugthanki Kebab (heals 19)
Bread (heals 5)
Stew (heals 5) Curry (heals 5)
Cake (heals 4 per slice) Chocolate Cake (heals 5 per slice)
Baked Potato (heals 4) Potato with Butter (heals 14) Chili Potato (heals 14) Potato With Cheese (heals 16) Egg Potato (heals 16) Mushroom Potato (heals 20) Tuna Potato (heals 22)
Potato (heals 2) Onion (heals 2) Cabbage (heals 2) Tomato (heals 3) Cooked Meat (heals 3) Cooked Chicken (heals 3)
Anchovy (heals 1) Crayfish (heals 2) Shrimp (heals 3) Sardine (heals 4) Herring (heals 5) Mackerel (heals 6) Trout (heals 7) Cod (heals 7) Pike (heals 8) Salmon (heals 9) Tuna (heals 10) Lobster (heals 12) Bass (heals 13) Swordfish (heals 14) Monkfish (heals 16) Shark (heals 20) Sea Turtle (heals 21) Manta ray (heals 22)
Purple Sweets (heals randomized 1-3, restores 10% run energy)
Peach (heals 8) Orange (heals 2) Banana (heals 2) Pineapple Chunks (heals 2) Pineapple Ring (heals 2) Strawberry (heals 6% of max hitpoints) Watermelon Slice (heals 5% of max hitpoints)
Pumpkin (heals 14) Easter Egg (heals 12) Truffle (was never introduces into RS, could be seen on GE list, made it heal 25)[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=REAL DIALOGUES]Real dialogues give a RSPS that genuine feeling.
In certain areas where it is appropriate I like to use real dialogues.
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ex38y1.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="CLAN CHAT"][B]Clan Chat[/B]
Clan Chat is fully coded. No really... fully coded. Ranks work, kicking abilities, lootshare including coinshare option.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/30mxy7a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ymya38.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=DWARF MULTICANNON][URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EFvc-XDYIyc"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EFvc-XDYIyc[/URL][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=AUTO VETERAN SYSTEM]After a certain amount of time you will automatically get a Veteran Rank. There are three different Veteran Ranks you can get: Senior Member (180 Days - Approx. 6 Months) Veteran (360 Days - Approx. 1 Year) Veteran+ (720 Days - Approx. 2 Years)
There are two separate copies of your "Join Date" held. One is used simply for knowing when you joined. The second is the same thing except it's use is to automatically give you your rank. So if you break a rule that would warrant your rank being revoked it won't automatically give it back.
To know the exact date and time you will receive each respective rank you can do ::checkvet Here is a picture of what happens when you use the ::checkvet command:
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/29bc5ms.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SIZE=4][B][color=red]Support Signatures[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
Yeah, I know they're not the best. That's because I made them myself.
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/119nnrb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/rh75vp.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/sx23v4.png[/img]
Credits to Klaus for these two:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ReD2AQH.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x81DuNe.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Relentless (508,525,Real Con,Farm,Agility)
item.dc:creator: @MikeeIsFtw MikeeIsFtw
item.description:
@MikeeIsFtw wrote:

[CENTER]

Relentless Forum

Thread Under Construction!
Media and information about the current features will be added periodically when I have the time to do so.
I’m pretty busy irl at the moment so I will most likely prioritize actually coding the server over making new media for coding which already exists

Relentless is a 508 loading 525 type server.

[SIZE=4]Automatic Starter[/SIZE]

[SPOILER=AUTOMATIC STARTER]Starter is automatically added to your account.

The “X” button is hidden from the bank interface.
When you right click an item on the bank interface all you get in “Cancel” option.
You can’t walk away, if you try to it does nothing.
Each time you’re given a set of items you receive information about them.
If you close your client and log back in it will resume the auto-starter without any glitching.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y9CqDRyGrsg[/SPOILER]

[SIZE=4][color=red]Skills[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR="#FFD700"]All skills except Hunter are coded, but as it says at the top the thread is ‘under construction’.[/COLOR]

[SPOILER=EXPERIENCE LAMPS]For yellow genie lamps you are granted “Skill Level x 100” instead of x10

mmzhqe.png763×500

oaacrq.png763×501
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=AGILITY]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EwQ7-LYimtQ[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=FARMING]NOTE: Right before making the video I increased plant speed by x50 or x2000 for trees. The real timers are just like on RuneScape.

System Features:

Rake the weeds out from patch (exp is given)
Seed dibber required to plant seeds (exp is given for planting)
Correct seed amount requirements(3 for allotment, 1 for herb and flower, ect)
34 Fully Functional Patches
(5 Herb, 8 Allotment, 5 Flower, 5 Fruit Tree, 3 Spirit Tree, 4 Tree Patches, 4 Bush Patches)
All patches support all seed/plant types (Herb patch even support Gout Tubers which grow Goutweeds)
Timer is not handled through tick (plants will continue to grow if user logs out)
Amount of produce to harvest saves (can’t get unlimited by relogging)
Compost bins are coded, but since death/disease is not the only use is to increase the yield of produce.
Fruit trees need health checked, then produce harvested, chopped down, and stump dug out

Relentless - Farming [Updated/Overview]

Supports the Limpwurt only Flower Patch at the Western Wilderness Ruins

5zma37.png759×496
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=CONSTRUCTION][COLOR="#FFD700"]The Construction skill is unfinished (as of 8/15/2014)[/COLOR]

There is more media pertaining to the Construction skill on my Construction Show-off Thread such as things I’ve updated since I first made the video.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7bm-9cc_aQ

[COLOR="#FFD700"]New video(8/15/2014):[/COLOR]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XBkleqIQX0Q[/SPOILER]

[SIZE=4][color=red]Mini-Games[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SPOILER=“BARROWS”]Barrows

This is a simple version of Barrows. Just kill all 6 brothers and the last you kill will drop your reward.

2cr99jm.png764×501
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=“DUEL ARENA”]Duel Arena

[COLOR="#FFD700"]Note: These are old pictures, people said they didn’t like the green text overlay so I took it out already.[/COLOR]

Instead of doing high risk stake fights and giveback fights in the wilderness or Bounty Hunter you also have the option to use the Duel Arena.
The Duel Arena can be easily accessed via Duelling Ring(the Wise Old Man will also give you a free teleport).

358pf9u.png940×491

2rgomes.png936×496

2gxp5iq.png940×496

1427ktw.png942×500

6rres4.png941×500

20zee7r.png758×497
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=PARTY ROOM - BALLOON BONANZA]Balloon Bonanza Feature:
You can fill the chest up with items then pull the lever and pay 50k for you stuff to be dropped.
After a certain amount of time has passed balloons will drop.
Popping these balloons can give you an item which was put into the chest.
NPCs around the server will announce the drop party.

Knightly Dance Feature:
You can pay 5k for knights to spawn and sing you a song.
They can sing you the following songs…
“It’s Not Unusual” by Tom Jones (This is a reference to the Fresh Prince of Bel Air)
“Never Gonna Give You Up” by Rick Astley (The “Rick Roll” Song)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oEhqenRnivY

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bk9S2KtVDP0[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=CLUE SCROLLS]System has at least 1 of every type of clue available.

25 Different Scrolls Available (currently)

2 Anagram Clues
4 Uri Emote Clues
5 Map Clues
3 Riddle Clues
2 Simple Clues
9 Coordinate Clues

Different Scrolls available for Different Difficulties (same as RS)

Easy: Simple, Map, Riddle, Uri Emote
Medium: Simple, Anagram, Map, Riddle, Uri Emote, Coordinate
Hard & Elite: Anagram, Map, Riddle, Uri Emote, Coordinate

Relentless - Clue Scroll/Treasure Trail [Updated] - YouTube[/SPOILER]

[SIZE=4][color=red]Miscellaneous[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SPOILER=FAIRY RINGS]Realistic system (Main fairy ring in Zanaris lets you access all others, all others teleport you to main ring in Zanaris)
All fairy ring codes except two (no mapdata for Enchanted Valley or Gorak Area… someone give plawks)
You actually walk into the ring
You can use Lunar or Dramen staff
Supports multi code combinations (like when you use AIR, DLR, DJQ, AJS to get to the secret fairy place in real RuneScape’s fairy tale part 2 quest)
Entering wrong code will teleport you a short distance from the fairy ring.

Relentless - Fairy RIngs - YouTube

jfw41l.png762×500
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=FOOD]I think even the small things have a certain level of importance.

Here is a list of all the food items which can be eaten:

Plain Pizza (heals 7 per slice)
Meat Pizza (heals 8 per slice)
Anchovy Pizza (heals 9 per slice)
Pineapple Pizza (heals 11 per slice)

Apple Pie (heals 7 per slice)
Redberry Pie (heals 5 per slice)
Meat Pie (heals 6 per slice)
Garden Pie (heals 6 per slice, +3 Farming)
Fish Pie (heals 6 per slice, +3 Fishing Boost)
Admiral Pie (heals 8 per slice, +5 Fishing Boost)
Wild Pie (heals 11 per slice, +5 Slayer Boost, +4 Ranged Boost)
Summer Pie (heals 11 per slice, +5 Agility Boost)

Ugthanki Kebab (heals 19)

Bread (heals 5)

Stew (heals 5)
Curry (heals 5)

Cake (heals 4 per slice)
Chocolate Cake (heals 5 per slice)

Baked Potato (heals 4)
Potato with Butter (heals 14)
Chili Potato (heals 14)
Potato With Cheese (heals 16)
Egg Potato (heals 16)
Mushroom Potato (heals 20)
Tuna Potato (heals 22)

Potato (heals 2)
Onion (heals 2)
Cabbage (heals 2)
Tomato (heals 3)
Cooked Meat (heals 3)
Cooked Chicken (heals 3)

Anchovy (heals 1)
Crayfish (heals 2)
Shrimp (heals 3)
Sardine (heals 4)
Herring (heals 5)
Mackerel (heals 6)
Trout (heals 7)
Cod (heals 7)
Pike (heals 8)
Salmon (heals 9)
Tuna (heals 10)
Lobster (heals 12)
Bass (heals 13)
Swordfish (heals 14)
Monkfish (heals 16)
Shark (heals 20)
Sea Turtle (heals 21)
Manta ray (heals 22)

Purple Sweets (heals randomized 1-3, restores 10% run energy)

Peach (heals 8)
Orange (heals 2)
Banana (heals 2)
Pineapple Chunks (heals 2)
Pineapple Ring (heals 2)
Strawberry (heals 6% of max hitpoints)
Watermelon Slice (heals 5% of max hitpoints)

Pumpkin (heals 14)
Easter Egg (heals 12)
Truffle (was never introduces into RS, could be seen on GE list, made it heal 25)[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=REAL DIALOGUES]Real dialogues give a RSPS that genuine feeling.

In certain areas where it is appropriate I like to use real dialogues.

2ex38y1.png510×840
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=“CLAN CHAT”]Clan Chat

Clan Chat is fully coded. No really… fully coded. Ranks work, kicking abilities, lootshare including coinshare option.

30mxy7a.png764×500

2ymya38.png764×502
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=DWARF MULTICANNON]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EFvc-XDYIyc[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=AUTO VETERAN SYSTEM]After a certain amount of time you will automatically get a Veteran Rank.
There are three different Veteran Ranks you can get:
Senior Member (180 Days - Approx. 6 Months)
Veteran (360 Days - Approx. 1 Year)
Veteran+ (720 Days - Approx. 2 Years)

There are two separate copies of your “Join Date” held.
One is used simply for knowing when you joined.
The second is the same thing except it’s use is to automatically give you your rank.
So if you break a rule that would warrant your rank being revoked it won’t automatically give it back.

To know the exact date and time you will receive each respective rank you can do ::checkvet
Here is a picture of what happens when you use the ::checkvet command:

29bc5ms.png762×500
[/SPOILER]

[SIZE=4][color=red]Support Signatures[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Yeah, I know they’re not the best. That’s because I made them myself.

Credits to Klaus for these two:

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
